definition: indirect, psychological method of getting sb to do as one wishes (e.g. questioning whether they are up to the task)
to arouse/to incite/to excite/to stimulate/sharp/fierce/violent
general/commander-in-chief (military)/king (chess piece)/to command/to lead
to desire/to invite/to request
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: I provoked him into doing something really stupid.
sentences.chinese: 我用激將法使他做了件很蠢的事。

sentences.english: Such a "blindingly" general will not be any good results.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的“激將法”一般不會有好效果。

sentences.english: He did it on a dare.
sentences.chinese: 他是在激將法的鼓動下做這件事的。

sentences.english: I dared him to jump from the bridge into the river.
sentences.chinese: 我用激將法要他從橋上跳入水中。

sentences.english: He jumped in the river at twelve o'clock last night for a dare.
sentences.chinese: 昨天夜裏十二點，他在激將法的鼓動下跳進河裏。

definition: lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
red in the face/extremely angry
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
dejected/despondent/depressed
hoodlum/bad guy
a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
stupid and ignorant (idiom)
the content of a conversation/words/remarks
to speak incoherently/to ramble/to talk irresponsibly
arrogant and despotic
druggist
